import styles from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import CartContext from '../../../store/cart-context' import {useContext} from 'react' export default function MealItem(props){ const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext) return(

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) }
